Hymn.English: 3 Let the hearts of those rejoice who seek the Lord

Hymn.Arabic: ابْتَغُوا الرَّبَّ وَاعْتَزُّوا وَأَطْلُبُوا وَجْهَهُ فِي كُلّ حِينٍ
Hymn.English: 4 Seek the Lord and His strength; Seek His face evermore!

Hymn.Arabic: أَذْكُرُوا عَجَائِبَهُ الَّتِي صَنَعَهَا ، آيَاتِهِ وَأَحْكَامَ فِيهِ. هَلِّلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 5 Remember His marvelous works which He has done, His wonders, and the judgments of His mouth,.     Alleluia
